roleset.name: purchase a debt so as to free money that would have been used for debt service for other uses

example.name: gerund, arb control
example.text: Yunfa Zhu and Yanqun Zhang , economic scholars of China 's Social ScienceInstitute , said : " [*] monetizing housing allocation is a large trend " .

roleset.note: MONETIZE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from monetize.01-v)
